item.title: The Open Book
item.description: The Open Book is my long-standing attempt to design a comprehensible and accessible e-book reader that you can build yourself (or at least have manufactured affordably). As of 2022, I am dramatically reworking the design based on lessons learned in the last two years. More detail soon.
